become-partner.title: Leave a request
become-partner.subtitle: Fill out the form and we will contact you!
become-partner.emailRequired: We will create your account with the email above

success.title: Your request has been sent
success.text: Thank you for your request. Our manager will contact you within an hour

product.title: Platform
product.subtitle: Coming soon on App & Play Store
product.description: Your customers will have the best experience with our iOS and Android applications. Every part of our application was thoroughly examined and carefully thought out to carry out our mission. Our app will be a valuable asset that will attract customers. It will have a simple interface and all the reliable information to accurately represent your center. Your best and most popular courses will show up in the respective categories. Have a free trial? An entry test or a discount? Your customers will be able to see that too
